isHangEnabled.title: Enable Hang mode
isHangEnabled.description:
Formatting mode that outputs better formatted code using various heuristics.
WARNING: Expect ~2x slowdown when enabled.

enabled.title: Format Files on Save
enabled.description: Automatically format entire file when saving.

clojureScopes.title: Clojure Scopes
clojureScopes.description:
Select which files containing Clojure should be formatted.
Use the command `Editor: Log Cursor Scope` to determine the scopes for a file.
